description: Try our easy to follow Steamed Pork Pearl Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Steamed Pork Pearl Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g shiitake mushrooms, stalks removed, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place rice into a bowl, cover with cold water and set aside for 1 hour.
Meanwhile, combine pork mince, shallots, mushrooms, soy, salt and white pepper in a bowl.
Divide mixture into 20 portions and roll into balls.
Drain rice and spread out onto a clean tea towel. Roll each mince ball in rice, coating well.

Line a large bamboo steamer with a sheet of baking paper. Place pork balls into steamer and cover with lid. Place steamer over a large saucepan or wok of simmering water. Cook for 20 minutes or until pearl balls are cooked through and rice on outside is tender.
